services.name: Brickwork
services.description: From new constructions to intricate repairs, we handle all types of bricklaying with precision.

services.name: Stonework
services.description: Custom stone patios, retaining walls, and beautiful veneers that add natural elegance to your property.

services.name: Chimney Repair
services.description: Expert chimney inspections, repairs, and rebuilding to ensure safety and functionality.

services.name: Patios & Walkways
services.description: Creating durable and stunning outdoor living spaces with pavers, flagstone, and more.

services.name: Tuckpointing
services.description: Preserving the integrity and appearance of your masonry by repairing mortar joints.

services.name: Foundation Repair
services.description: Addressing cracks and structural issues to ensure your building's foundation is secure.

testimonials.quote: BrickedUp Masonry transformed our backyard with a beautiful new stone patio. The craftsmanship is outstanding, and the team was professional throughout the entire project.
testimonials.author: - John & Jane Doe

testimonials.quote: Our chimney was in desperate need of repair. It looks better than new! Highly recommend their services.
testimonials.author: - Alice Smith

testimonials.quote: We hired them for some complex brickwork on our historic home. Their attention to detail and skill were evident. We're thrilled with the results.
testimonials.author: - Robert Jones
